content.question: Which of the following is a correct expression for the magnitude of the rate of change of momentum of the two-block system over the small interval of time <math alttext="delta t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math> after <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mi>t</mi> <mo>=</mo> <mn>0</mn> </mstyle> </math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times m g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times m g delta t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="2 m v divided by delta t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>/</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="m v divided by delta t" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>m</mi><mi>v</mi><mo>/</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mi>t</mi></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="mu sub k, end sub, times m g" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>μ</mi><mi>k</mi></msub><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
